system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Fencing Swords)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WGoOFcYvOi7LaB0E]{Fencing Martial Arts}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.X25ceQr3EpFCrd40]{Fencing Specialist}

Benefits

When wielding a sabre, cutlass, rapier, parrying dagger, sai, or jitte, the Critical Threat range for the selected weapon is 12-18, and any natural roll of a 15-18 is an automatic hit. The character can also make a touch attack with the chosen weapon for no additional Combat Points.

Normal

16-18 are automatic hits without this feat.
system.summary: 12-18 Crit, 15-18 auto hit, free touch attacks
